mapper.insert: insert into love_user ( number, sex, age, marriage, nation, height, weight, zodiac, constellation, education, salary, other ) values( #{number}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{marriage}, #{nation}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{zodiac}, #{constellation}, #{education}, #{salary}, #{other} )
insert into app_date ( appName, appId, dateValue, activeNums, rank ) values( #{appName}, #{appId}, #{dateValue}, #{activeNums}, #{rank} )
